author: Reuters Editorial
title: Poland's No.1 bank PKO Q1 net profit up 44 pct, above f'cast
text:
WARSAW, May 22 (Reuters) - Polandâ€™s largest lender, PKO BP , reported a 44 percent rise in its first-quarter net profit on Tuesday, as an accelerating economic growth boosted demand for banking services and products, while costs were kept under control.
The state-run PKO said its net profit in the first three months of the year amounted to 757 million zlotys ($207.9 million) and was 7 percent higher than 705 million zlotys expected by analysts. ($1 = 3.6416 zlotys) (Reporting by Marcin Goclowski; Editing by Amrutha Gayathri)
